name: Active Art for Infants & Toddlers
description: It’s never too soon to turn your kids onto art. Combining art exploration with children’s songs and other activities, this fun, interactive class is geared towards our very youngest artists. Together, children and their caregivers will use toys and everyday art tools to make this introduction to art extra fun.
